column4: Hi, I have installed ubuntu for just a week and my computer is overheating. I am beginner, can anybody help me solve it please?
I don't want to repeat myself, but I am totally lost girl.. I have installed ubuntu for just a week and my computer is overheating. I am beginner, can anybody help me solve it please?
